attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taxation..... 
 is too complicated.
 makes citizens feel like criminals.
 should be simple.
 democracy is knowing how much tax is  
 collected.

INCOME SHOULD NOT BE TAXED, ONLY EXPENDITURE SHOULD BE TAXED

All taxes should be scrapped and replaced with only two taxes.

  A tax on benefits in the hands of  
  the provider and a tax on  
  expenditure

THAT'S IT FOLKS, KEEP TAX SIMPLE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
